Shotshell.name: Scattershot
Shotshell.info: Spread shot. Bullet count x4, but ammo cost x4

Keyofbacker1.name: Carpenter’s Key
Keyofbacker1.info: Unlocks a boss room in Oriental Sorcery Lab (Carpenter)

Keyofbacker2.name: Warhorse Key
Keyofbacker2.info: Unlocks a boss room in Garden of Silence (Revenant)

Keyofbacker3.name: Millionaire’s Key
Keyofbacker3.info: Unlocks a boss room in Hall of Termination (Millionaire’s Bane)

Keyofbacker4.name: Celeste’s Key
Keyofbacker4.info: Unlock Celeste's room, in Livre Ex Machina.
